messages.content: You are a NuCore smart-home assistant. You convert the user’s request into one or more NuCore routines based on the provided DEVICE STRUCTURE.

DEVICE STRUCTURE:
***Device***
Name: Notification Controller
ID: n004_controller
  ***Properties***
    NodeServer Online [id=ST]
      Enum [uom id=25]
        Disconnected [0]
        Connected [1]
        Failed [2]
    REST Status [id=GV1]
      Enum [uom id=25]
        Not Running [0]
        Running [1]
        Failed [2]
        Receive Error [3]
    Message [id=GV2]
      Enum [uom id=25]
  ***Accept Commands***
    Message [id=SET_MESSAGE]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
          Enum [uom id=25]
    System Custom Content [id=SET_SYS_CUSTOM]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
    Query [id=QUERY]
    Build Profile [id=BUILD_PROFILE]
    Install Profile [id=INSTALL_PROFILE]
  ***Send Commands***
    On [id=DON]
    Off [id=DOF]***Device***
Name: UD Mobile
ID: n004_udmobile
Parent: Notification Controller [ID: n004_controller]
  ***Properties***
    Last Status [id=ST]
      Enum [uom id=2]
        False [0]
        True [1]
    Error [id=ERR]
      Enum [uom id=25]
        None [0]
        Illegal Value [1]
        App Auth [2]
        User Auth [3]
        Create Message [4]
        Send Message [5]
        Bad Parameter [6]
  ***Accept Commands***
    Send Message [id=GV10]
        Parameter 1: name=Group [id=Group]
          Enum [uom id=25]
            default [0]
            Billy [1]
        Parameter 2: name=Sound [id=Sound]
          Enum [uom id=25]
            default [0]
            Clock Radio Alarm [1]
            SMS Notification [2]
            Dog Bark [3]
            Small Resonant Alarm [4]
            Software Start Positive [5]
            UI Notification [6]
            Alarm Burglar [7]
            Rooster Crowing [8]
            Hawk [9]
        Parameter 3: name=Content [id=Content]***Device***
Name: LiFX Controller
ID: n012_lifxctl
  ***Properties***
    NodeServer Online [id=ST]
      Enum [uom id=2]
        False [0]
        True [1]
    Bulbs discovered [id=GV0]
      Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
  ***Accept Commands***
    Re-Discover Bulbs [id=DISCOVER]
    All On [id=DON]
    All Off [id=DOF]
    Color All [id=SET_COLOR]
        Parameter 1: name=n/a [id=n/a]
          Enum [uom id=25]
            Red [0]
            Orange [1]
            Yellow [2]
            Green [3]
            Cyan [4]
            Blue [5]
            Purple [6]
            Pink [7]
            White [8]
            Cold White [9]
            Warm White [10]
            Gold [11]
    All HSBKD [id=SET_HSBKD]
        Parameter 1: name=Hue [id=H]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 2: name=Saturation [id=S]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 3: name=Brightness [id=B]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 4: name=Color Temperature [id=K]
          Range 2500 to 9000 Unit Kelvin [uom id=26] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 5: name=Transition Time [id=D]
          Range 0 to 540000 Unit millisecond [uom id=42] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
    All Waveform [id=WAVEFORM]
        Parameter 1: name=Hue [id=H]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 2: name=Saturation [id=S]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 3: name=Brightness [id=B]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 4: name=Color Temperature [id=K]
          Range 2500 to 9000 Unit Kelvin [uom id=26] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 5: name=Period [id=PE]
          Range 0 to 540000 Unit millisecond [uom id=42] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 6: name=Cycles [id=CY]
          Range 0 to 65535 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 7: name=Duty Cycle [id=DC]
          Range -32768 to 32768 Unit Raw [uom id=56] (step of 1 and precision of 1).
        Parameter 8: name=Waveform [id=WF]
          Enum [uom id=25]
            Saw [0]
            Sine [1]
            HalfSine [2]
            Triangle [3]
            Pulse [4]
            Transient Saw [5]
            Transient Sine [6]
            Transient HalfSine [7]
            Transient Triangle [8]
            Transient Pulse [9]

USER QUERY: At sunset, if any LiFX bulbs are discovered, set all LiFX to Warm White and notify the default UD Mobile group with the "Software Start Positive" sound.
